name: YHA Hobart Central
description:
YHA Hobart Central is one of the most central hostels in all of Hobart we are right opposite the Tasmanian Museum and Art Gallery, one block from the Harbour and less than 10 minutes' walk to Salamanca. 

Our staff hail from all over the world but have decided to call Hobart home and are more than happy to help you plan your island adventure. We know the best tour operators (hint: they're not all on Instagram) the secret spots, how to get there and how to fit it all in to your 5 day itinerary (because you probably thought Tasmania is just that little island underneath Australia, right?). 

If you prefer recommendations for good coffee and amazing local produce over where to find the cheapest goon, then we're probably the hostel for you. We have regular activities that change with the season so make sure you check out our website to see what's on. 

Reception is attended from 8am-10.30am and 2pm-8pm. If arriving outside these hours, please let us know in advance so we can arrange a self late check-in for you.

Please know that we are a cashless property.

houseRules.notes:
Notice Nearby Construction Works: Please be advised that construction is taking place next door on weekdays between 10am and 4pm for the coming weeks. While some noise is expected during these hours, our team is committed to minimising any disruption to your stay. Additionally, the adjacent laneway is being used for construction purposes, so bike, scooter, and motorcycle storage in that area is currently unavailable. We appreciate your understanding and patience during this time. If you have any questions or need assistance, please contact the property.

Reception is open from 8am - 10:30am and 2pm - 8pm. If arriving outside of these hours, please contact the property directly.

We kindly advise that this property does not have a lift, rooms and facilities are accessed via stairs.

Please inform YHA Hobart Central in advance of your expected arrival time.

Please know that we are a cashless property.

Guests are required to show photo identification and credit card upon check-in. 

We require taking a profile photo of all guests staying in shared rooms or private rooms with a shared bathroom. If you do not wish to have your photo taken, we will not be able to accommodate you.

Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or legal guardian.

The supervision of guests under 18 years of age remains the responsibility of their parent or legal guardian whilst at a YHA property. Guests under 18 years of age are not permitted to stay in Co-living shared dormitory rooms, they can only be accommodated in private rooms. For further information on the YHA child safety policy please contact the property directly.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
